alert.note: Alert for Finney; Haskell; Scott; Seward (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 17 at 12:22PM CDT until April 18 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 8 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 043, 063, 076, AND 086... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM to 8 PM CDT Tuesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 043 Scott, Fire Weather Zone 063 Finney, Fire Weather Zone 076 Haskell and Fire Weather Zone 086 Seward. * WINDS...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent. * IMPACTS...Given the ongoing drought and continued dormant vegetation, any ignitions will have the potential to burn out of control quickly. Any outdoor burning, or outdoor activities involving sparks or flames, should be avoided.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
